hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 5 Top

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Deku Tree#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Bug Bottle#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Third Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that between the #crawl spaces in the Spirit Temple# chests contain...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Forest Temple Compass#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Ice Cavern#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that King Dodongo dislikes smoke.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Spirit Temple Compass# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #fairy outside Hyrule Castle# holds #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.
